commentaries.commentary: Pep Guardiola watches intently from the dugout, alongside his pensive
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Always analyzing, even when winning. Such focus!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: And the Bayern players celebrate another goal! Schweinsteiger, Alaba, and Mandžukić clearly delighted.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: They're absolutely flying today! Confidence is through the roof!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Thiago to Ribéry, a superb low cross! Müller with the clinical finish! Goal for Bayern!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What a magnificent team goal! Absolutely textbook attacking play from Bayern!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Look at Thomas Müller's composure in the box.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: The keeper had no chance. Marouane Fellaini knows it too.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: The cross comes in! It's a header! GOAL!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Unbelievable power! David De Gea had no chance.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Absolutely no stopping that! Phil Jones couldn't intervene. Schweinsteiger's header was unstoppable!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1
